spell_tooltip.description: The cooldown of Mass Invisibility is reduced by 4 min and can affect allies in combat.
Blink and Shimmer apply Slow at 100% effectiveness to all enemies you Blink through. For each enemy you Blink through, the cooldown of Blink and Shimmer are reduced by 1 sec, up to 5 sec.

While an enemy player is affected by your Polymorph or Mass Polymorph, your movement speed is increased by 25% and your Versatility is increased by 12%. 

Additionally, Polymorph and Mass Polymorph no longer heal enemies.

Shields you in flame, absorbing 1.8 million damage for 1 min.

Melee attacks against you cause the attacker to take 13,139 Fire damage.

Encases you in a block of ice, protecting you from all attacks and damage for 10 sec, but during that time you cannot attack, move, or cast spells.

While inside Ice Block, you heal for 50% of your maximum health over the duration.

Causes Hypothermia, preventing you from recasting Ice Block for 30 sec.

Your spell critical strike damage is increased by 10%. When your direct damage spells fail to critically strike a target, your spell critical strike chance is increased by 2%, up to 10% for 8 sec. 

When your spells critically strike Overflowing Energy is reset.
Magical energy flows through you while in combat, building up to 10% increased damage and then diminishing down to 2% increased damage, cycling every 10 sec.
The cooldown of Ice Block is reduced by 60 sec.
Gain a shield that absorbs 6% of your maximum health for 15 sec after you Blink.
Reduces magic damage taken by 4%.

Creates 3 copies of you nearby for 40 sec, which cast spells and attack your enemies.

While your images are active damage taken is reduced by 20%. Taking direct damage will cause one of your images to dissipate.

Draw power from within, dealing 224,928 Arcane damage over 3.1 sec to enemies within 18 yds. 

While channeling, your Mage ability cooldowns are reduced by 12 sec over 3.1 sec.
Alters the fabric of time, returning you to your current location and health when cast a second time, or after 10 sec. Effect negated by long distance or death.
While inside Ice Block, you heal for 50% of your maximum health over the duration.
Successfully interrupting an enemy with Counterspell reduces its cooldown by 4 sec.

Reduces the cooldown of Alter Time by 10 sec. 

Alter Time resets the cooldown of Blink and Shimmer when you return to your original location.
Your Barriers heal you for 20% of the damage absorbed.

Teleports you 20 yds forward, unless something is in the way. Unaffected by the global cooldown and castable while casting.

Gain a shield that absorbs 6% of your maximum health for 15 sec after you Shimmer.
Increases Critical Strike chance by 2%.
Increases Haste by 2%.
All of your snare effects reduce the target's movement speed by an additional 10%.
The cooldowns of Blink and Shimmer are reduced by 2 sec.
Increases your movement speed by 20% for 3 sec after casting Blink and 40% for 6 sec after returning from Alter Time.
Frost Nova now has 2 charges.
Your barrier's cooldown recharges 30% faster while the shield persists.

Makes you invisible and untargetable for 20 sec, removing all threat. Any action taken cancels this effect.

You take 60% reduced damage while invisible and for 3 sec after reappearing.
Ice Block now reduces all damage taken by 70% for 6 sec but no longer grants Immunity, prevents movement, attacks, or casting spells. Does not incur the Global Cooldown.
At any moment, you have a chance to gain Combustion for 5 sec, 1 Fire Blast charge, or Time Warp for 6 sec.
Cast Blazing Barrier on yourself and 4 allies within 40 yds.
Hurls an immense fiery boulder that causes 227,373 Fire damage.

Blasts the enemy for 118,800 Fire damage. 

Fire: Castable while casting other spells. Always deals a critical strike.

Hurls a Phoenix that deals 93,762 Fire damage to the target and reduced damage to other nearby enemies.

Always deals a critical strike.
Each time your Fireball fails to critically strike a target, it gains a stacking 20% increased critical strike chance. Effect ends when Fireball critically strikes.
Fire Blast's cooldown is reduced by 2 sec.
Phoenix Flames deals 15% increased damage and always critically strikes.

Scorches an enemy for 27,442 Fire damage.

When cast on a target below 30% health, Scorch is a guaranteed critical strike and increases your movement speed by 30% for 3 sec.

Castable while moving.
Pyroblast and Flamestrike's cast time is reduced by 0.5 sec and their damage dealt is increased by 5%.
Casting Scorch on targets below 30% health increase the target's damage taken from you by 7% for 12 sec. This effect stacks up to 2 times.
Increases the maximum number of Fire Blast charges by 2.

Your spells have a 5% increased chance to deal a critical strike.

You gain 10% more of the Critical Strike stat from all sources.
Hot Streak increases the amount of Ignite damage from Pyroblast or Flamestrike by an additional 10%.
If Phoenix Flames only hits 1 target, it deals 50% increased damage and applies Ignite at 150% effectiveness.
While Ignite is on 3 or fewer enemies it flares up dealing an additional 20% of its damage to affected targets.

Engulfs you in flames for 12 sec, increasing your spells' critical strike chance by 100% and granting you Mastery equal to 75% of your Critical Strike stat. Castable while casting other spells.

When you activate Combustion, you gain 2% Critical Strike damage, and up to 4 nearby allies gain 1% Critical Strike for 10 sec.
Damaging a target with Pyroblast or Fireball increases the damage it receives from Ignite by 0.5%. Stacks up to 50 times.
Ignite deals 15% more damage and Fireball deals 15% more damage while Combustion is not active. Fire Blast spreads Ignite to 2 additional nearby targets during Combustion.
Your critical strike damage is increased by 3%. When you activate Combustion, you gain 2% additional critical strike damage, and up to 4 nearby allies gain 1% critical strike for 10 sec.
Combustion grants mastery equal to 75% of your Critical Strike stat and lasts 2 sec longer.
Fire Blast and Phoenix Flames increase your mastery by 2% for 5 sec. This effect stacks up to 3 times.
Each consecutive critical strike you deal increases critical strike damage you deal by 4%, up to 16% for 6 sec.

Your Fireball, Pyroblast, Fire Blast, Scorch and Phoenix Flames critical strikes reduce the remaining cooldown on Combustion by 1.0 sec.

Flamestrike critical strikes reduce the remaining cooldown of Combustion by 0.2 sec for each critical strike, up to 1 sec.

Casting Pyroblast or Flamestrike while Hot Streak is active has an 6% chance to repeat the spell cast at 50% effectiveness.

This effect counts as consuming Hot Streak.
Damage dealt to targets below 35% health is increased by 7%.
Phoenix Flames damage increased by 15% and your direct-damage spells reduce the cooldown of Phoenix Flames by 1 sec.
While Combustion is active, your Fire Blast and Phoenix Flames recharge 50% faster.
While Combustion is not active, consuming Hot Streak has a low chance to cause all Pyroblasts and Flamestrikes to have no cast time and be guaranteed critical strikes for 5 sec.

When your direct damage spells hit an enemy 25 times, gain 1 stack of Born of Flame. 

 Born of Flame
Phoenix Flames refunds a charge on use and its damage is increased by 200%.

While Combustion is active your Fireball, Pyroblast, Fire Blast, Scorch, and Phoenix Flames deal 70% increased damage and reduce the cooldown of Combustion by 1.25 sec.

While Combustion is active, Flamestrike deals 35% increased damage and reduces the cooldown of Combustion by 0.25 sec for each critical strike, up to 1.25 sec.

Every 6 times you consume Hot Streak, conjure a Spellfire Sphere.

While you're out of combat, you will slowly conjure Spellfire Spheres over time.

 Spellfire Sphere
Increases your spell damage by 1%. Stacks up to 5 times.
Consuming Hot Streak grants you 0.5% Haste for 10 sec. Stacks up to 10 times. Multiple instances may overlap.

When you cast Combustion, summon an Arcane Phoenix to aid you in battle.

  Arcane Phoenix
Your Arcane Phoenix aids you for the duration of your Combustion, casting random Arcane and Fire spells.
Conjuring a Spellfire Sphere increases the damage of your next Pyroblast by 20% or your next Flamestrike by 30%.
Your Blazing Barrier now grants 5% avoidance while active and 3% leech for 5 sec when it breaks or expires.
Your Arcane Phoenix will Spellsteal when it is summoned and when it expires.

Consuming Burden of Power causes your next cast of Fire Blast to strike up to 2  additional targets and call down a storm of 4 Meteorites on its target.

Each Meteorite's impact reduces the cooldown of Fire Blast by 2.0 sec.
When you cast Combustion, its duration is extended by 0.5 sec for each Spellfire Sphere you have, up to 2.5 sec.

Over its duration, your Arcane Phoenix will consume each of your Spellfire Spheres to cast an exceptional spell.

Upon consuming a Spellfire Sphere, your Arcane Phoenix will grant you Lingering Embers.

 Lingering Embers
Increases your spell damage by 1%.
Spellfire Spheres can now stack up to 5 times.

While under the effects of a casted Combustion, you gain twice as many stacks of Mana Cascade.

When your Arcane Phoenix expires, it empowers you, granting Hyperthermia for 2 sec, plus an additional 1.0 sec for each exceptional spell it had cast.

 Hyperthermia:
Pyroblast and Flamestrike have no cast time and are guaranteed to critically strike.

Shields you in flame, absorbing 1.8 million damage for 1 min.

Melee attacks against you cause the attacker to take 13,225 Fire damage.

Encases you in a block of ice, protecting you from all attacks and damage for 10 sec, but during that time you cannot attack, move, or cast spells.

While inside Ice Block, you heal for 50% of your maximum health over the duration.

Causes Hypothermia, preventing you from recasting Ice Block for 30 sec.

Your spell critical strike damage is increased by 10%. When your direct damage spells fail to critically strike a target, your spell critical strike chance is increased by 2%, up to 10% for 8 sec. 

When your spells critically strike Overflowing Energy is reset.
Magical energy flows through you while in combat, building up to 10% increased damage and then diminishing down to 2% increased damage, cycling every 10 sec.
The cooldown of Ice Block is reduced by 60 sec.
Gain a shield that absorbs 6% of your maximum health for 15 sec after you Blink.
Reduces magic damage taken by 4%.

Creates 3 copies of you nearby for 40 sec, which cast spells and attack your enemies.

While your images are active damage taken is reduced by 20%. Taking direct damage will cause one of your images to dissipate.

Draw power from within, dealing 226,204 Arcane damage over 3.1 sec to enemies within 18 yds. 

While channeling, your Mage ability cooldowns are reduced by 12 sec over 3.1 sec.
Alters the fabric of time, returning you to your current location and health when cast a second time, or after 10 sec. Effect negated by long distance or death.
While inside Ice Block, you heal for 25% of your maximum health over the duration.
Successfully interrupting an enemy with Counterspell reduces its cooldown by 4 sec.

Reduces the cooldown of Alter Time by 10 sec. 

Alter Time resets the cooldown of Blink and Shimmer when you return to your original location.
Your Barriers heal you for 40% of the damage absorbed.

Teleports you 20 yds forward, unless something is in the way. Unaffected by the global cooldown and castable while casting.

Gain a shield that absorbs 6% of your maximum health for 15 sec after you Shimmer.
Increases Critical Strike chance by 2%.
Increases Haste by 2%.
All of your snare effects reduce the target's movement speed by an additional 10%.
Increases your movement speed by 20% for 3 sec after casting Blink and 40% for 6 sec after returning from Alter Time.
Frost Nova now has 2 charges.
Casting Fire Blast reduces the cooldown of your loss of control abilities by 2 sec.

Makes you invisible and untargetable for 20 sec, removing all threat. Any action taken cancels this effect.

You take 60% reduced damage while invisible and for 3 sec after reappearing.
Whenever one of your Barriers is removed, reduce its cooldown by 4 sec.
Ice Block now reduces all damage taken by 70% for 6 sec but no longer grants Immunity, prevents movement, attacks, or casting spells. Does not incur the Global Cooldown.
At any moment, you have a chance to gain Combustion for 5 sec, 1 Fire Blast charge, or Time Warp for 6 sec.
Cast Blazing Barrier on yourself and 4 allies within 40 yds.
Hurls an immense fiery boulder that causes 229,851 Fire damage.

Blasts the enemy for 118,566 Fire damage. 

Fire: Castable while casting other spells. Always deals a critical strike.

Hurls a Phoenix that deals 95,526 Fire damage to the target and reduced damage to other nearby enemies.

Always deals a critical strike.
Each time your Fireball fails to critically strike a target, it gains a stacking 20% increased critical strike chance. Effect ends when Fireball critically strikes.
Fire Blast's cooldown is reduced by 2 sec.
Phoenix Flames deals 15% increased damage and always critically strikes.

Scorches an enemy for 27,459 Fire damage.

When cast on a target below 30% health, Scorch is a guaranteed critical strike and increases your movement speed by 30% for 3 sec.

Castable while moving.
Pyroblast and Flamestrike's cast time is reduced by 0.5 sec and their damage dealt is increased by 5%.
Casting Scorch on targets below 30% health increase the target's damage taken from you by 7% for 12 sec. This effect stacks up to 2 times.
Increases the maximum number of Fire Blast charges by 2.
Every 12 seconds, your next non-instant Fireball, Flamestrike, or Pyroblast has a 40% reduced cast time.

Your spells have a 5% increased chance to deal a critical strike.

You gain 10% more of the Critical Strike stat from all sources.
Hot Streak increases the amount of Ignite damage from Pyroblast or Flamestrike by an additional 10%.
If Phoenix Flames only hits 1 target, it deals 50% increased damage and applies Ignite at 150% effectiveness.
While Ignite is on 3 or fewer enemies it flares up dealing an additional 20% of its damage to affected targets.

Engulfs you in flames for 12 sec, increasing your spells' critical strike chance by 100% and granting you Mastery equal to 75% of your Critical Strike stat. Castable while casting other spells.

When you activate Combustion, you gain 2% Critical Strike damage, and up to 4 nearby allies gain 1% Critical Strike for 10 sec.
Damaging a target with Pyroblast or Fireball increases the damage it receives from Ignite by 0.5%. Stacks up to 50 times.
Your critical strike damage is increased by 3%. When you activate Combustion, you gain 2% additional critical strike damage, and up to 4 nearby allies gain 1% critical strike for 10 sec.
Combustion grants mastery equal to 75% of your Critical Strike stat and lasts 2 sec longer.
Fire Blast and Phoenix Flames increase your mastery by 2% for 5 sec. This effect stacks up to 3 times.
Each consecutive critical strike you deal increases critical strike damage you deal by 2%, up to 8% for 6 sec.

Your Fireball, Pyroblast, Fire Blast, Scorch and Phoenix Flames critical strikes reduce the remaining cooldown on Combustion by 1.0 sec.

Flamestrike critical strikes reduce the remaining cooldown of Combustion by 0.2 sec for each critical strike, up to 1 sec.

When you're not under the effect of Combustion, your critical strike chance is increased by 5.0%.

While you're under the effect of Combustion, your critical strike damage is increased by 5.0%.
Phoenix Flames damage increased by 15% and your direct-damage spells reduce the cooldown of Phoenix Flames by 1 sec.
While Combustion is active, your Fire Blast and Phoenix Flames recharge 50% faster.

Calls down a meteor which lands at the target location after 3 sec, dealing 346,425 Fire damage to all enemies hit reduced beyond 8 targets, and burns the ground, dealing 62,869 Fire damage over 8.5 sec to all enemies in the area.
Damaging an enemy with 15 Fireballs or Pyroblasts causes your next Fireball or Pyroblast to call down a Meteor on your target.

When your direct damage spells hit an enemy 25 times, gain 1 stack of Born of Flame. 

 Born of Flame
Phoenix Flames refunds a charge on use and its damage is increased by 200%.
After consuming 10 Hot Streaks, your next non-instant Pyroblast or Flamestrike cast within 30 sec grants you Combustion for 6 sec and deals 260% additional damage.
Blazing Barrier also casts an Ice Barrier at 25% effectiveness.

Launches a bolt of frostfire at the enemy, causing 168,217 Frostfire damage, slowing movement speed by 60%, and causing an additional 62,259 Frostfire damage over 8 sec.

Frostfire Bolt generates stacks for both Fire Mastery and Frost Mastery.
The cooldown of Frost spells with a base cooldown shorter than 4 minutes is reduced by 30%.

Comet Storm now also calls down a Meteor at 150% effectiveness onto your target's location.

Meteor now also calls down a Comet Storm at 300% effectiveness onto your target location.
Casting damaging Frost or Fire spells has a high chance to increase the damage of your next Frostfire Bolt by 10%, stacking up to 5 times.

Your Frost and Fire spells have a chance to trigger an additional bolt of Frostfire, dealing 72,684 damage.

This effect generates Frostfire Mastery when activated.

Consuming Excess Fire causes your next Phoenix Flames to also cast Ice Nova at 150% effectiveness. Ice Novas cast this way do not freeze enemies in place.

When you consume Excess Frost, the cooldown of Meteor is reduced by 5 sec.

Your Frost and Fire spells have a chance to activate Frostfire Empowerment, causing your next Frostfire Bolt to be instant cast, deal 60% increased damage, explode for 80% of its damage to nearby enemies.

Casting Meteor causes your next Fire Blast to explode in a Frostfire Burst, dealing 244,434 Frostfire damage to nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.

Frostfire Burst reduces the cooldown of Phoenix Flames by 5 sec.

Frostfire Empowerment grants you maximum benefit of Frostfire Mastery, refreshes its duration, and grants you Excess Frost and Excess Fire.

Casting Combustion or Icy Veins grants you Frostfire Empowerment.

Shields you in flame, absorbing 1.8 million damage for 1 min.

Melee attacks against you cause the attacker to take 13,404 Fire damage.

Encases you in a block of ice, protecting you from all attacks and damage for 10 sec, but during that time you cannot attack, move, or cast spells.

While inside Ice Block, you heal for 50% of your maximum health over the duration.

 Lit Fuse:

Up to 3 enemies hit by this explosion also become a Living Bomb, but this effect cannot spread further.

Your spells have a 5% increased chance to deal a critical strike.

You gain 10% more of the Critical Strike stat from all sources.

Your chance of gaining Lit Fuse when consuming Hot Streak is increased by 4%.

Living Bomb damage increased by 50%.
If Phoenix Flames only hits 1 target, it deals 50% increased damage and applies Ignite at 150% effectiveness.
While Ignite is on 3 or fewer enemies it flares up dealing an additional 20% of its damage to affected targets.

Engulfs you in flames for 12 sec, increasing your spells' critical strike chance by 100% and granting you Mastery equal to 75% of your Critical Strike stat. Castable while casting other spells.

When you activate Combustion, you gain 2% Critical Strike damage, and up to 4 nearby allies gain 1% Critical Strike for 10 sec.
Damaging a target with Pyroblast or Fireball increases the damage it receives from Ignite by 0.5%. Stacks up to 50 times.
Flamestrike damage increased by 25%.
Your critical strike damage is increased by 3%. When you activate Combustion, you gain 2% additional critical strike damage, and up to 4 nearby allies gain 1% critical strike for 10 sec.
Combustion grants mastery equal to 75% of your Critical Strike stat and lasts 2 sec longer.
Fire Blast and Phoenix Flames increase your mastery by 2% for 5 sec. This effect stacks up to 3 times.
Flamestrike and Living Bomb apply Mastery: Ignite at 100% increased effectiveness.

Your Fireball, Pyroblast, Fire Blast, Scorch and Phoenix Flames critical strikes reduce the remaining cooldown on Combustion by 1.0 sec.

Flamestrike critical strikes reduce the remaining cooldown of Combustion by 0.2 sec for each critical strike, up to 1 sec.

When you're not under the effect of Combustion, your critical strike chance is increased by 5.0%.

While you're under the effect of Combustion, your critical strike damage is increased by 5.0%.
Phoenix Flames damage increased by 15% and your direct-damage spells reduce the cooldown of Phoenix Flames by 1 sec.
While Combustion is active, your Fire Blast and Phoenix Flames recharge 50% faster.
Damaging an enemy with 15 Fireballs or Pyroblasts causes your next Fireball or Pyroblast to call down a Meteor on your target.
Casting Combustion grants Lit Fuse and Living Bomb's damage is increased by 30% while under the effects of Combustion.

When your direct damage spells hit an enemy 25 times, gain 1 stack of Born of Flame. 

 Born of Flame
Phoenix Flames refunds a charge on use and its damage is increased by 200%.

While Combustion is active your Fireball, Pyroblast, Fire Blast, Scorch, and Phoenix Flames deal 70% increased damage and reduce the cooldown of Combustion by 1.25 sec.

While Combustion is active, Flamestrike deals 35% increased damage and reduces the cooldown of Combustion by 0.25 sec for each critical strike, up to 1.25 sec.

Lit Fuse now turns up to 3 targets into Living Bombs.

Living Bombs can now spread to 5 enemies.
Consuming Hot Streak grants you 0.5% Haste for 10 sec. Stacks up to 10 times. Multiple instances may overlap.

When you cast Combustion, summon an Arcane Phoenix to aid you in battle.

  Arcane Phoenix
Your Arcane Phoenix aids you for the duration of your Combustion, casting random Arcane and Fire spells.
Conjuring a Spellfire Sphere increases the damage of your next Pyroblast by 20% or your next Flamestrike by 30%.
Your Blazing Barrier now grants 5% avoidance while active and 3% leech for 5 sec when it breaks or expires.
Your Arcane Phoenix will Spellsteal when it is summoned and when it expires.

Consuming Burden of Power causes your next cast of Fire Blast to strike up to 2  additional targets and call down a storm of 4 Meteorites on its target.

Each Meteorite's impact reduces the cooldown of Fire Blast by 2.0 sec.
When you cast Combustion, its duration is extended by 0.5 sec for each Spellfire Sphere you have, up to 2.5 sec.

Over its duration, your Arcane Phoenix will consume each of your Spellfire Spheres to cast an exceptional spell.

Upon consuming a Spellfire Sphere, your Arcane Phoenix will grant you Lingering Embers.

 Lingering Embers
Increases your spell damage by 1%.
Spellfire Spheres can now stack up to 5 times.

While under the effects of a casted Combustion, you gain twice as many stacks of Mana Cascade.

When your Arcane Phoenix expires, it empowers you, granting Hyperthermia for 2 sec, plus an additional 1.0 sec for each exceptional spell it had cast.

 Hyperthermia:
Pyroblast and Flamestrike have no cast time and are guaranteed to critically strike.

Shields you in flame, absorbing 1.8 million damage for 1 min.

Melee attacks against you cause the attacker to take 13,134 Fire damage.

Encases you in a block of ice, protecting you from all attacks and damage for 10 sec, but during that time you cannot attack, move, or cast spells.

While inside Ice Block, you heal for 50% of your maximum health over the duration.

Causes Hypothermia, preventing you from recasting Ice Block for 30 sec.

Your spell critical strike damage is increased by 10%. When your direct damage spells fail to critically strike a target, your spell critical strike chance is increased by 2%, up to 10% for 8 sec. 

When your spells critically strike Overflowing Energy is reset.
Magical energy flows through you while in combat, building up to 10% increased damage and then diminishing down to 2% increased damage, cycling every 10 sec.
The cooldown of Ice Block is reduced by 60 sec.
Steals a beneficial magic effect from the target. This effect lasts a maximum of 2 min.
Removes all Curses from a friendly target.

Creates 3 copies of you nearby for 40 sec, which cast spells and attack your enemies.

While your images are active damage taken is reduced by 20%. Taking direct damage will cause one of your images to dissipate.

Draw power from within, dealing 224,547 Arcane damage over 3.1 sec to enemies within 18 yds. 

While channeling, your Mage ability cooldowns are reduced by 12 sec over 3.1 sec.
Alters the fabric of time, returning you to your current location and health when cast a second time, or after 10 sec. Effect negated by long distance or death.
While inside Ice Block, you heal for 50% of your maximum health over the duration.
Successfully interrupting an enemy with Counterspell reduces its cooldown by 4 sec.

Reduces the cooldown of Alter Time by 10 sec. 

Alter Time resets the cooldown of Blink and Shimmer when you return to your original location.

Teleports you 20 yds forward, unless something is in the way. Unaffected by the global cooldown and castable while casting.

Gain a shield that absorbs 6% of your maximum health for 15 sec after you Shimmer.
Causes an explosion around yourself, dealing 49,373 Fire damage to all enemies within 8 yds, knocking them back, and reducing movement speed by 80% for 6 sec.
Increases Critical Strike chance by 2%.
Enemies in a cone in front of you take 61,869 Fire damage and are disoriented for 4 sec. Damage will cancel the effect.
Increases Haste by 2%.

When your barrier receives melee attacks, you have a 10% chance to be granted 1 Fire Blast charge. 

Casting your barrier removes all snare effects.
All of your snare effects reduce the target's movement speed by an additional 10%.
Increases your movement speed by 20% for 3 sec after casting Blink and 40% for 6 sec after returning from Alter Time.

Enemies hit by Cone of Cold are frozen in place for 5 sec instead of snared.

When your roots expire or are dispelled, your target is snared by 90%, decaying over 3 sec.
Your barrier's cooldown recharges 30% faster while the shield persists.

Makes you invisible and untargetable for 20 sec, removing all threat. Any action taken cancels this effect.

You take 60% reduced damage while invisible and for 3 sec after reappearing.
Whenever one of your Barriers is removed, reduce its cooldown by 4 sec.
Ice Block now reduces all damage taken by 70% for 6 sec but no longer grants Immunity, prevents movement, attacks, or casting spells. Does not incur the Global Cooldown.
At any moment, you have a chance to gain Combustion for 5 sec, 1 Fire Blast charge, or Time Warp for 6 sec.
Cast Blazing Barrier on yourself and 4 allies within 40 yds.
Hurls an immense fiery boulder that causes 225,423 Fire damage.

Blasts the enemy for 122,430 Fire damage. 

Fire: Castable while casting other spells. Always deals a critical strike.

Hurls a Phoenix that deals 93,695 Fire damage to the target and reduced damage to other nearby enemies.

Always deals a critical strike.
Fire Blast's cooldown is reduced by 2 sec.
Phoenix Flames deals 15% increased damage and always critically strikes.

Scorches an enemy for 27,654 Fire damage.

When cast on a target below 30% health, Scorch is a guaranteed critical strike and increases your movement speed by 30% for 3 sec.

Castable while moving.
Pyroblast and Flamestrike's cast time is reduced by 0.5 sec and their damage dealt is increased by 5%.

Consuming Hot Streak has a 6% chance to grant you Lit Fuse.

 Lit Fuse:
Your next Fire Blast turns up to 1 nearby target into a Living Bomb that explodes after 1.6 sec, dealing 24,744 Fire damage to the target and reduced damage to all other enemies within 10 yds.

Up to 3 enemies hit by this explosion also become a Living Bomb, but this effect cannot spread further.
Increases the maximum number of Fire Blast charges by 2.

Blazing Barrier also casts an Ice Barrier at 25% effectiveness.

Launches a bolt of frostfire at the enemy, causing 166,524 Frostfire damage, slowing movement speed by 60%, and causing an additional 62,259 Frostfire damage over 8 sec.

Frostfire Bolt generates stacks for both Fire Mastery and Frost Mastery.
The cooldown of Frost spells with a base cooldown shorter than 4 minutes is reduced by 30%.

Comet Storm now also calls down a Meteor at 150% effectiveness onto your target's location.

Meteor now also calls down a Comet Storm at 300% effectiveness onto your target location.
Casting damaging Frost or Fire spells has a high chance to increase the damage of your next Frostfire Bolt by 10%, stacking up to 5 times.

Your Frost and Fire spells have a chance to trigger an additional bolt of Frostfire, dealing 72,684 damage.

This effect generates Frostfire Mastery when activated.

Consuming Excess Fire causes your next Phoenix Flames to also cast Ice Nova at 150% effectiveness. Ice Novas cast this way do not freeze enemies in place.

When you consume Excess Frost, the cooldown of Meteor is reduced by 5 sec.

Your Frost and Fire spells have a chance to activate Frostfire Empowerment, causing your next Frostfire Bolt to be instant cast, deal 60% increased damage, explode for 80% of its damage to nearby enemies.

Casting Meteor causes your next Fire Blast to explode in a Frostfire Burst, dealing 248,978 Frostfire damage to nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.

Frostfire Burst reduces the cooldown of Phoenix Flames by 5 sec.

Frostfire Empowerment grants you maximum benefit of Frostfire Mastery, refreshes its duration, and grants you Excess Frost and Excess Fire.

Casting Combustion or Icy Veins grants you Frostfire Empowerment.

Only castable when you have Clearcasting.

Launches five waves of Arcane Missiles at the enemy over 2.0 sec, causing a total of 245,299 Arcane damage.
Clearcasting can stack up to 2 additional times.
Consuming Clearcasting increases the damage of your next 2 Arcane Blasts or Arcane Barrages by 20%.

Arcane Missiles channels 20% faster.

Clearcasting makes Arcane Explosion echo for 40% damage.
Arcane Missiles fires 3 additional missiles.
For each Arcane Charge, Arcane Barrage hits 1 additional nearby target for 40% damage.
Casting Arcane Intellect summons a Familiar that attacks your enemies and increases your maximum mana by 10% for 1 hour.

Expend all of your current mana to annihilate your enemy target and nearby enemies for up to 397,114 Arcane damage based on Mana spent. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Generates Clearcasting.

For the next 15 sec, your Mana regeneration is increased by 425% and spell damage is increased by 35%.
Casting a damaging spell has a 5% chance to make your next Arcane Barrage deal 50% increased damage and generate 4 Arcane Charges.
Consuming Arcane Charges increases your Haste by 2% for 12 sec, stacks up to 5 times.

During Arcane Surge, your Familiar fires 4 bolts instead of 1.

Damage from your Arcane Familiar has a small chance to grant you up to 2% of your maximum mana.

Arcane Missiles can now be channeled while moving.

Evocation can be channeled while moving.
Arcane Blast has a 10% chance to generate an additional Arcane Charge. If you were to gain an Arcane Charge while at maximum charges instead gain 10% Arcane damage for 10 sec.

Applies Touch of the Magi to your current target, accumulating 20% of the damage you deal to the target for 12 sec, and then exploding for that amount of Arcane damage to the target and reduced damage to all nearby enemies.

Generates 4 Arcane Charges.
Spells empowered by Nether Precision cause their target to suffer an additional 8% of the damage dealt over 6 sec.
Reduces Arcane Blast's mana cost by 5% and increases its damage by 8%.
Clearcasting has a 5% increased chance to proc.

Increases your mana regeneration by 1,500% for 2.3 sec and grants Clearcasting.

While channeling Evocation, your Intellect is increased by 2% every 0.4 sec. Lasts 20 sec.
Your Touch of the Magi now accumulates 25% of the damage you deal.
When a spell consumes Clearcasting, its damage is increased by 10%.
Damaging a target with Arcane Missiles increases the damage they take from Arcane Missiles, Arcane Barrage, and Arcane Blast by 1.0% for 6 sec. Multiple instances may overlap.
Direct damage you deal to enemies affected by Touch of the Magi, causes an explosion that deals 9,058 Arcane damage to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Arcane Debilitation's duration is increased by 2 sec.

When you apply a stack of Arcane Debilitation, you have a 25% chance to apply another stack of Arcane Debilitation.

This effect can trigger off of itself.

Every 3 times you consume Clearcasting, gain Aether Attunement.

Aether Attunement:
Your next Arcane Missiles deals 100% increased damage to your primary target and fires at up to 4 nearby enemies dealing 50% increased damage.

Arcane damage dealt is increased based on your current mana, up to 6% at full mana.

Mana Regen is increased based on your current mana, up to 20% when out of mana.
Arcane Barrage deals an additional 100% damage against targets below 35% health.
Each time Arcane Missiles hits an enemy, the damage of your next Arcane Barrage is increased by 5%. This effect stacks up to 20 times.

Your Touch of the Magi now also conjures a spark, causing the damage from your next Arcane Barrage, Arcane Blast, and Arcane Missiles to echo for 100% of their damage.

Upon receiving damage from all three spells, the spark explodes, dealing 370,605 Arcane damage to all nearby enemies.
Arcane Barrage has a 10% chance per Arcane Charge consumed to launch an Arcane Orb in front of you at 100% effectiveness.

Casting Icy Veins conjures 8 Frost Splinters.

During Icy Veins, whenever you conjure a Frost Splinter, you have a 100% chance to conjure an additional Frost Splinter.
While a target is under the effects of Blizzard, 30% of the direct damage dealt by a Frost Splinter is also dealt to nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Enemies damaged by your Frozen Orb conjure 1 Frost Splinter, up to 4.

Frozen Orb damage is increased by 10%.
You have 40% increased movement speed during Alter Time.

Your Ice Barrier can absorb up to 50% more damage based on your missing Health.

Max effectiveness when under 50% health.
Whenever an Embedded Frost Splinter is removed, it explodes, dealing 9,217 Frost damage to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Consuming Winter's Chill with Glacial Spike conjures 2 additional Frost Splinters.
